ARTICLE.TITLE: Policeman martyred in firing incident in Karachi
ARTICLE.TEXT:
The attackers managed to escape from the scene after the incident.

KARACHI (Dunya News) – Some unidentified persons riding on motorcycle opened fire and martyred traffic police official in Karimabad area of Karachi on Thursday night, Dunya News reported.

According to eye-witnesses, the attakers opened fire at traffic police official Muhammad Ali in Karimabad. He was rushed to the hospital where he succumbed to his wounds.

The attackers managed to escape from the scene after the incident. Meanwhile, Police have gathered evidences from the scene and started investigation.

METADATA.description: The attackers managed to escape from the scene after the incident.
